statements: DELETE FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' AND conversion_count > 50
DELETE FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_id = 100 AND ad_type = 'banner';
DELETE FROM ad_placements WHERE click_count < 10 AND conversion_count >= 5;

DELETE FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_date >= '2022-03-15' AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM ad_impressions WHERE user_id = 5678 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
